channel.title: Server not connecting
channel.description:
I've downloaded the Moparscape client and everytime I try and log in it always says 'Error connecting to the server. Must be down. Click "cancel" then "Start server" to make your own.
Yet the server I'm using already IS my own, yet I clicked cancel and start server and went back to the login page and the same details including the same server ip were still there and once again it came up with that message. Could anyone please help me? :confused:
Thank you

item.title: Server not connecting
item.dc:creator: @909g 909g
item.description:
@909g wrote:

Still comes up with the same message on the login screen >_<
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2009, 03:27:14 pm[/size][hr]Don’t worry I fixed it, thank you

Put in as the ip 0.0.0.0
